abstract: London Underground subway system introduces 24-hour service, called the Night Tube, on weekends, starting with Central and Victoria lines; expanded service will include three other lines by fall 2017.

headline.print_headline: In a First, the Tube Stays Up All Night, but Only on the Weekends
headline.main: ‘Night Tube,’ a First for London, Brings All-Night Service to Two Subway Lines

snippet: A new 24-hour weekend service opened to the delight of late-night crowds. “People were cheering, ‘Night Tube!’ It seems to be the buzz,” a Tube worker said....
lead_paragraph: A new 24-hour weekend service opened to the delight of late-night crowds. “People were cheering, ‘Night Tube!’ It seems to be the buzz,” a Tube worker said.
